text:
María de la Paz Elizabeth Sofía Adriana de la Huerta y Bruce (born September 3, 1984), known by her stage name Paz de la Huerta, is an American actress and model.
De la Huerta is known for her roles in the movies "The Cider House Rules" (1999), "A Walk to Remember" (2002), "Choke" (2008), "Enter the Void" (2009), "Nurse 3D" (2013) and as Lucy Danziger in the HBO drama series "Boardwalk Empire".
During the height of the Me Too movement, she accused Harvey Weinstein of rape.
